cardData.title: Classync Platform
cardData.description: A video review platform built from scratch to help teachers and students collaborate better through video content with interactive feedback and commenting. Features time-coded comments, organized class/project management, nested comment threads, and responsive design for all devices.

cardData.title: Movie App
cardData.description: I built a movie browsing site using React that fetches data from an external API. Users can explore popular movies, view details, and navigate to actor pages to see their filmography. The app uses React Router with dynamic routes and Styled Components for styling.

cardData.title: Messaging app
cardData.description: A simple messaging app built with React and styled-components. Users can post and read uplifting messages, stored and retrieved via an API. Clean design and responsive UI.

cardData.title: Accessibility focused Quiz
cardData.description: An interactive, accessibility-first quiz application built with JavaScript. Designed to deliver a seamless and inclusive user experience, it demonstrates a strong focus on clean design, responsive functionality, and user-centric development.

cardData.title: Weather App with API
cardData.description: A dynamic weather application powered by a real-time API, delivering up-to-date current conditions and a weekly forecast. Users can easily search and switch between cities, with a sleek interface designed for both speed and clarity. Built to be responsive, intuitive, and reliable.

cardData.title: Recepie finder with API
cardData.description: A dynamic recipe application powered by an API, offering users the ability to filter and sort recipes by cuisine, preparation time, and price. With a user-friendly interface and personalized search options, it makes discovering and planning meals both easy and enjoyable.

cardData.title: Boulder Zone
cardData.description: My first project using HTML, CSS, and some JavaScript. I used Flexbox and Grid for layout, added a hero image, and focused on clean, semantic code. It was a great intro to building responsive, visually engaging websites.
